com.uofa.adventure_app.application

Class AdventureApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • com.uofa.adventure_app.application.AdventureApplication

  • public class AdventureApplication
extends Application
    The Application for all of the activities within the app. Creates instances of each of the controllers and keeps track of the current user.
    Author:
    Chris Pavlicek
